Class javachart.chart.DateLineChart

           +----javachart.chart.LineChart

                   +----javachart.chart.DateLineChart
public class DateLineChart
extends LineChart
A DateLineChart is the same as a LineChart but uses a DateAxis to represent X values
See Also:
DateAxis

constructs a default chart

constructs a default chart with the specified name

constructs a default chart with the specified name and default Graphics class
